gameFiles

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameFiles.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Mark Wolgin, Josh Davis The player class hold information on the two players. It holds information on which side the player is, and the cards in there hand. There will only ever be two players.

    • Field Detail

      • hand

        private java.util.ArrayList<Card> hand
        Is an ArrayList of Card, that is, it will hold the cards available to the player on there turn. It will have both scoring cards and turn cards.

      • side

        private Side side
        This is the ENUM Side identifier

        public void playCard()

        Temporary Method
        Parameters:
        t - Card to draw, if -1, then it pulls randomly
        Returns:
        Selected card

      • drawCard

        private Card drawCard(int index)
        Take a card from the deck. If index is less than 0, takes a random card. Currently uses hand instead of deck. Card is also added to the hand.
        Parameters:
        index - Card Index
        Returns:
        the card taken out of the deck
